entry.title: LES SUÃŠTES WIND WARNING , North Mountain (Cape Breton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 2:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 4.3°C
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 3.7°C
Wind: S 29 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with flurries beginning before morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023
